website_summaries.verdict: The Pixel 3a is a great mid-range option for those who want a Pixel but can't afford the real deal. There might be more powerful and flashy phones at this price but Google offers something different.

customer_reviews.title: A lovely thing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Easy to use, for an old lady, great help sections. Fast, can manage the apps I want, and need (law changing with regards to buying stuff online)' It is light weight, big enough so I can see stuff but not so big I can't hold it. A lovely piece of gear.
customer_reviews.author: MeganB

customer_reviews.title: Slimline durable phone, high quality images, best ever photo’s *****
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had Apple iPhones , but this year my daughter recommended this phone after my iPhone was loosing it’s charge after many years of loyal service, I won’t criticise Apple, I still have an iPad, but this phone is fabulous, the photo quality is the best I’ve had ever, it’s so easy to navigate, it has so many features that after 3 months I’m still exploring it, I’m still learning to drive it
customer_reviews.author: Yani Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Faulty keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard would not stay on screen making the phone basically unusable. This happened twice - two different units- so not sure what was the cause. Maybe my wife's app library is incompatible with this model phone? We got fully refunded both times, so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the camera is what I purchased the phone for and it hasn't disappointed. Night shots are very impressive. The size is perfect for the pocket and with a huge choice of cases available, most won't bulk it out much at all. Have been using it for a few months now and with regular updates from Google, the feature set is often added to and tweaked, making it secure and often interesting to see what's been updated. For support and security, it can't be faulted. NFC and contactless payments has been a godsend, especially when your wallet is forgotten!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Steeple

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've not updated my phone for a long, long time and my Son suggested this one as he's got the same. I've found doing the fingerprint a bit hard to do so I've stuck with a pin number instead, I think this is due to me using one of those wallet thingies for it. I've found the camera a lot better than my last phone and so far it's been easy to use, I'm still learning what it can and can't do.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mcnamee

customer_reviews.title: Another brilliant Pixel
customer_reviews.text: I love Google Pixels, pure android largely uncluttered by bloatware and with a really logical interface. This 3a is great value for money and pleasingly has a 3mm headphone socket. Replaced my Pixel 2 which I'd knackered the USB connector. It's smooth and fast and looks very smart. Oh and the transfer was a doddle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an android phone on a mid level budget, you can't go wrong with this. Excellent quality camera too.
customer_reviews.author: Trench Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fast phone
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fast phone Switching from iOS to Android Data transfer tools are great. Google standard apps are excellent Everything just works
customer_reviews.author: Kiran S

customer_reviews.title: Low call volume so frustrating
customer_reviews.text: You can't make calls on this phone. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything else was great, just didn't come with a charging plug or adapter...
customer_reviews.author: Priya Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in a phone with a great camera as well - would recommend to anyone after a mid-range phone that does the basics well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Murgatroyd

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Just the job, except this phone has no notification light, which is a pain for quick checking incoming messages
customer_reviews.author: Simon R

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks just as new. Only complaint is that there was a tiny scratch on the display but that is to be expected when you buy used products.
customer_reviews.author: Linus Engstam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is brilliant. Phone size is just right. Battery lasts one day. I normally spend less buying a smart phone but the camera makes the price worth it. I paid £300 in the sale.
customer_reviews.author: MR NA TRODD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to work great. Excellent picture. Good start up. So far I am happy with this produck.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Sablouh

customer_reviews.title: A bit thicker than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone, thickness is there for definite if that bothers you? would recommend this model due to lower price:what you get
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, no issues with this seller and phone is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Pixel 3a. A is for Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. The software is faultless and rooms smoothly. The camera is amazing at the price point. The only downside is not having a memory card slot. One thing people don't mention is how good the Pixel is a picking up signal. I live in Orkney and my Samsung A20e really struggled to pick up the O2 mast. The Pixel however, has no problem. I have found that even indoors it out performs the Samsung. Top quality phone, just like the old Nexus days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.J.Priestley

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera but no wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: The camera on the Pixel 3a is very very good the fingerprint works reliably unlike the Samsung 6 I had previously. The major lack is wireless charging but with a thin case and an "add on" wireless charger this can be overcome. Cut a slot in the case and then plug the USB connector in as shown in picture. One then has to use a wireless method for getting pictures off the device as the USB socket is taken up. Really should be 5 star rating given the price but I am being mean because of the fiddling about to get it to work as I like.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm no tech geek and I managed to set it up myself and transfer data from old phone. Sad I know but it even put my apps in alphabetical order, now that's cool! I don't think it's quite as good as my Huawei, it's not as easy to forward messages over different apps. But for a cheap phone it's ok. I got a 6gb sim from BT. So works out less than £18 a month over 2 years, by buying the phone and having a SIM only contact, that's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone!!! I converted from the greedy Apple empire and tried a few different android phones which I didn't really get on with but this phone is awesome. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Gaz 77

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, very good value
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice size and feels solid Battery life is very good Stereo sound is very good quality The Camera is great, but you get a little lens distorion if you don't hold it straight. Screen is beautiful all in all a lot of phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PhilEAF92

customer_reviews.title: All you need in a smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value smartphone and the camera is absolutely stunning. I have been very impressed with it and overall I have had no issues. Does everything you need and more, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone, brilliant camera (see photos)
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera so much. It's got everything you'd hope for in an Android phone and more. The camera is outstanding! To the point I've put my SLR camera up for sale.
customer_reviews.author: DebsMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day ahead of given earliest delivery date which was a bonus. Very pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: anne jewell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, delivery and packaging, what more needs to be said
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, delivery and packaging, what more needs to be said
customer_reviews.author: Yorkshire-Matt

customer_reviews.title: was very impressed with my new phone & got it next day
customer_reviews.text: I like it all just need to get used to it
customer_reviews.author: VICKY

customer_reviews.title: That it does the job intended.
customer_reviews.text: Like all to do with the phone very happy how it works the good rating for it is well deserved .
customer_reviews.author: mal

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useless
customer_reviews.text: The back of the phone is made of plastic, unlike the pixel 3, so it bends easily causing the front screen to break from the tension. This happened to me, had to replace the front screen and back for a stupid amount of money to prevent this happening again. The front screen broke again so I bought a Huawei instead. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Severe eye strain
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months of the Pixel 3a, I'm selling it due to severe eye strain caused by the PWM it uses to regulate screen brightness. If you've got sensitive eye, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: JoyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant smartphone, but i smashed my screen real quick! :-D The camera is mindblowing. The rest of the features and software is pure bliss. Go for it, no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: VAKORIN

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 3A Just Black 64GB, GA00747-UK
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Just BlackGoogle pixel 3A Just Black 64GB - Main camera single 12.2 MP, f/1.8, 28mm (wide), 1/2.55", 1.4Μm, dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, features dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama, Video 2160p@30fps, 1080P at30/60/120fps selfie camera single 8 MP, f/2.0, 24mm (wide), 1.12Μm, features HDR, Video 1080p@30fps.
feature_bullets: Display Type OLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colours, Size 5.6 inches, 79.6 cm2 (75.0% screen-to-body ratio), Resolution 1080 x 2220 pixels, 18.5: 9 ratio (441 ppi density), protection Asahi Dragontrail glass, always-on display
Os Android 9.0 (Pie), Chipset Qualcomm SDM670 Snapdragon 670 (10 Nm), CPU Octa-core (2x2. 0 GHz 360 Gold & 6x1. 7 GHz Kryo 360 Silver), GPU Adreno 615
Sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
